description: Pack light, stay protected, go anywhere - the versatile Beta LT Pant is designed for all seasons and any adventure. Light, durable N70p Gore-Tex fabric with Tricot Technology delivers waterproof, windproof, breathable protection on treks, approaches, and climbs. Full side zips make them easy to get on and off - even over boots - and the waist design rides comfortably under a pack. The articulated trim fit gives you freedom of movement without bulk, and a thigh pocket stashes small essentials.
name: Arcteryx Beta LT Pants, Reg - Mens
